title: Topic 005 Question 019
body: You need to create a QnA Maker service named QNA12345678 in the East US Azure region. QNA12345678 must contain a knowledge base that uses the questions and answers available at https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12435/windows-10-upgrade-faq.
To complete this task, sign in to the Azure portal and the QnA Maker portal.
